auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Password reset successfully. You can now sign in.
auth.restaurantOwnerNotAllowed: This app is for customers only. To access the restaurant dashboard, please sign in on the website nuxapp.de. Your session was not saved.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Send your message to support and we will get back to you soon
contact.successMessage: Your message was sent successfully. We will contact you soon.
contact.errorMessage: Failed to send message. Check your connection and try again.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how NUX collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our loyalty rewards application.
privacy.aboutAppContent: App name: NUX. This is the first version of the app. Contact: info@nuxapp.de — this is our only contact email.
privacy.informationWeCollectContent: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make purchases, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and payment information.
privacy.howWeUseContent: We use the information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send technical notices and support messages, and communicate with you about products, services, and offers.
privacy.informationSharingContent: We do not sell or transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy or as required by law.
privacy.dataSecurityContent: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.contactUsContent: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: info@nuxapp.de

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: Welcome to the NUX loyalty rewards application. By using our service, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.
terms.aboutAppContent: App name: NUX. This is the first version of the app. Contact: info@nuxapp.de — this is our only contact email.
terms.acceptanceOfTermsContent: By accessing and using this application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.
terms.useLicenseContent: Permission is granted to temporarily use this application for personal, non-commercial use only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.
terms.userAccountContent: You are responsible for safeguarding your password and for maintaining the confidentiality of your account. You agree not to disclose your password to any third party.
terms.loyaltyPointsContent: Loyalty points earned through this application have no cash value and cannot be transferred or sold. Points may expire according to the terms set by participating restaurants.
terms.prohibitedUsesContent: You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose, to violate any laws, to infringe upon intellectual property rights, or to transmit any harmful or malicious code.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityContent: In no event shall NUX be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the application or its content.
terms.contactInformationContent: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at: info@nuxapp.de
